SELECT bh.owner,bh.phone,bh.record_user_name,bh.`owner1`, bh.`phone1`, (select COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) FROM bus_house_clicklog where click_user_name=#{clickusername} and DATE(create_time) = DATE(NOW()) and record_user_name!=#{clickusername} and type='1'
) AS clickcount FROM bus_house bh WHERE bh.id = #{houseId} and bh.isshare = '0'

SELECT bh.record_user_name, bh.xiaoqu_name, bh.region_name, bh.street_name, bh.numfloor, bh.numunit, bh.floor, bh.numhousehold, bh.address,(select COUNT(DISTINCT house_id) FROM bus_house_clicklog where click_user_name=#{clickusername} and DATE(create_time) = DATE(NOW()) and record_user_name!=#{clickusername} and type='2'
) AS clickcount FROM bus_house bh WHERE bh.id = #{houseId} and bh.isshare = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_house SET record_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE bus_house bh SET bh.record_user_name=#{recordUserName}, bh.record_time=NOW(), bh.record_rel_name=(select su.relname from sys_user su where su.username=#{recordUserName}) WHERE bh.id=#{id}

UPDATE bus_house bh SET bh.iskey=#{iskey}, bh.key_user_name=#{keyUserName}, bh.key_rel_name=(select su.relname from sys_user su where su.username=#{keyUserName}), bh.key_store_id=#{keyStoreId}, bh.key_number=#{keyNumber} WHERE bh.id=#{id}
UPDATE bus_house bh SET bh.iskey=0, bh.key_user_name='', bh.key_rel_name='', bh.key_store_id='', bh.key_number='' WHERE bh.id=#{id}

UPDATE bus_house bh SET bh.isshare=#{isshare}, bh.record_user_name=#{recordUserName}, bh.record_time=NOW(), bh.record_rel_name=(select su.relname from sys_user su where su.username=#{recordUserName}) WHERE bh.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT bh.id,su.`username` record_user_name, (CASE WHEN TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bh.record_time)>=10 AND TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bh.record_time) <15 THEN '1' WHEN TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bh.record_time)>=15 THEN '2' END) casetype FROM `bus_house` bh LEFT JOIN `sys_user` su ON ( su.`username`=bh.`record_user_name` OR su.`username` IN (SELECT user_name FROM bus_house_like WHERE `house_id`=bh.`id`)) LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id AND sur.role_id = 2 WHERE (TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(bh.record_time)) >= 10 AND bh.isshare = '0'

SELECT
FROM `bus_house` bh, bus_house_like bhl WHERE bhl.user_name=#{userName} and bhl.house_id=bh.id ORDER BY bhl.create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM bus_house bh,base_store_range bsr,sys_user su
WHERE su.username=#{userName} and su.store_id=(SELECT store_id FROM `sys_user` WHERE username=bh.record_user_name) and bh.isfine = 1 and bh.state=0 group by bh.id order by bh.create_time desc

SELECT
,su.phone recordUesrPhone ,(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `bus_house_like` WHERE house_id=bh.id AND user_name=#{username} ) likeType, (DATE_ADD(create_time,INTERVAL 1 DAY)>NOW()) explorationTimeType, (SELECT be.state FROM bus_examine be WHERE be.house_id=bh.`id` AND be.state = 0 AND be.type=4) examineState ,bs.store_name ketStoreName FROM bus_house bh LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.username=bh.record_user_name LEFT JOIN base_store bs ON bs.id=bh.key_store_id WHERE bh.id=#{id}
